alert.note: Alert for Central Washington Cascade Foothills; Eastern Columbia Basin, Palouse, Spokane Area; Lower Palouse, Snake River; Waterville Plateau; Western Columbia Basin (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 03 at 3:16PM PDT until August 03 at 9:00PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WARM DRY AND BREEZY THROUGH THIS EVENING... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM PDT THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR CENTRAL WASHINGTON CASCADES, WATERVILLE PLATEAU, COLUMBIA BASIN, SPOKANE AREA, PALOUSE, AND SNAKE RIVER... * Affected Area: Fire Weather Zone 705 Foothills of Central Washington Cascades, Fire Weather Zone 706 Waterville Plateau, Fire Weather Zone 707 Western Columbia Basin, Fire Weather Zone 708 Eastern Columbia Basin -Palouse -Spokane Area and Fire Weather Zone 709 Lower Palouse -Snake River. * Winds: Southwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * Relative Humidities: 8 to 18 percent. * Impacts: Rapid fire spread with any new fires.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Central Washington Cascade Foothills; Eastern Columbia Basin, Palouse, Spokane Area; Lower Palouse, Snake River; Waterville Plateau; Western Columbia Basin
